I've never seen this on torrent before and I don't believe there's ever been a DVD release - this was sent to me by a friend in Japan who encoded it as mp4 so I could easily pop it onto my Apple TV. Quality is admittedly not amazeballs, but certainly decent and watchable. Supposedly the rights were bought by an American company that's going to edit it down into a two-hour feature film, so here's what might be the only chance for those outside Japan to see Kiyoshi Kurosawa's full unedited mini-series.

First episode is 640x360, episodes 2-5 are 512x288.

Total time approx. 270 mins.
